txt.en: Ost Dunhoth: The Power of Gortheron

Gortheron is a master over life and death, reality and illusion. He is marshalling forth forces from all across Eriador to his banner.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This deed can only be completed on Tier 2 difficulty.</rgb>
Defeat Gortheron at his most powerful
Gortheron is a master over life and death, reality and illusion. He is marshalling forth forces from all across Eriador to his banner.
You have defeated Gortheron at his most powerful.
